sentences.sContent: The cobra sank its venomous fangs into his hand.
sentences.sCn: 眼镜蛇将毒牙咬进他的手。

synos.tran: （犬，狼等的）尖牙；[解剖]牙根；（毒蛇的）[脊椎]毒牙；尖端

remMethod.val: 和tang(n. 强烈的气味)一起记

words.tran: 有牙根的；有毒牙的，有尖牙的

trans.tranCn: (犬, 狼等的)尖牙, 犬牙, (毒蛇的)毒牙, 牙根, 尖端
trans.tranOther: a long sharp tooth of an animal such as a snake or wild dog
